
<!--
Parameters:

title, context, scope, method, alpha, htmlTable, id, latexTable

-->
<div class="mlTable">

    <center><h2>{{title}}</h2></center>
    <ul>
        <li>Experiment source: <a href="#{{context}}">{{context}}</a></li>   
        <li>Test: {{scope}} post-hoc test</li>   
        <li>Adjust Method: {{method}}</li>   
        <li>&alpha; = {{alpha}}</li>      
        <li>Boldfaced results represent non-rejected hipotheses</li>
    </ul>
    <center></center>
    </br>
    </br>
    
    <center>
    {{htmlTable}}
    </center>
    
    </br>
    </br>
        
    <input type="checkbox" name="Show Latex Code" id="{{id}}_check"    
    onclick="    
    if (document.getElementById('{{id}}_check').checked) {
        document.getElementById('{{id}}').style.display  = 'block';
    } else {
        document.getElementById('{{id}}').style.display  = 'none';
    }">
    <span style="font-size: 14px;">Show LaTeX Code</span>
    </br>
    </br>
    
    <div id="{{id}}" class="latexCode" style="display:none;">
        <input type="button" value="Select All" onclick="selectText('{{id}}_code')"/>
        <pre><code id="{{id}}_code"class="language-latex">{{latexTable}}</code></pre>
    </div>
    </br>
    <hr>
    </br>
    </br>
</div>
